Class Deck

java.lang.Object
  Deck

public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object

An extension to the LinkedList class. Methods use more game-relevant terms. It also puts more authority over what can be done to the deck. Contains the deck and the cards that are being played on (the playDeck).
